page.title: 11Recreation in South Benfleet
page.content: Apart from play and sports facilities, there are vast open spaces:Thundersley Glen,Shipwright's Wood,Benfleet Downs and part of the Hadleigh Country Park which stretches from Benfleet Downs to Leigh-on-Sea.There are well-defined footpaths providing walks in all seasons in woodland,fields,downland and seascapes,some with extensive views across the Thames Estuary, Kent and Canvey Island.The Hadleigh Country Park of 1858 acres is being managed and financed between Essex C.C(55%), Southend (35%)and Castle Point (10%) Access in South Benfleet is through Shipwrights Close,off Benfleet road.Apart from areas of downland and marshes with considerable interest of landscape and wildlife, it comprises the Poynetts and Kersey Farm.The area is of outstanding international biological importance.
